results.title: Unself portrait
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
This work is an experimental work/abstract narrative on the notion of self, or the lack of a self identity, as a human figure tries to understand who he is.

results.title: Tumbleweeds
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
An dramatic look at the trouble faced by a teenage couple. The girl finds out that she is pregnant and has decided to give it up for adoption. The boy still loves her and they must face making the final decision together.

results.title: Stan
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
A bizarre and comical look at a machine which processes different types of people and converts into the same looking character. This animted short depicts the way society homogenises the way people are meant to be and disregards anyone who stands outside of the accepted norm.

results.title: Smoking ad
results.brief_description: A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival. A student exercise in the creation of an advertisment suitable for television. This short animated work highlights the health dangers related to smoking.

results.title: Nine lives
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
Using multiple locations such as Bourke Street, school playgrounds and the beach, a group of students show us their acrobatic abilities, jumping off sides of wallls, sculptures and common school playground equipment.

results.title: Imagery of the mind
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
An animated short about a character using his imagination to fight the boredom of his mundane life.

results.title: A Haunted school
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
This moving picture describes bizarre events at a school. A girl goes missing and two detectives set out to find her. Once in the school they turn into students and are horrified when they experience ghostly sightings of the victim. They suffer mortal wounds and turn on each other as they are scared out of their wits. Finally they themselves become possessed and are forever trapped at the school, never to escape.

results.title: Detention
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
Four students are being kept in detention for one hour after school. They are bored and cannot wait to be allowed to leave. The clock ticks slowly on. Finally the clock strikes four and they are free to go.

results.title: Crushed
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
A young man, in his disgust at watching a terrible film entitled “Fear”, makes the dramatic decision to run it over several times with his car.

results.title: Can you stop the music?
results.brief_description: A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.This documentary asks local councils, residential associations and live music venue operators to give their views on the impact that inner-city gentrification has had on the live music scene in Melbourne. The once strong scene has seen a decline in the number of venues due to the increasing demand for inner city living.
results.description: A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.This documentary asks local councils, residential associations and live music venue operators to give their views on the impact that inner-city gentrification has had on the live music scene in Melbourne.
